Kerala.name: Alappuzha
Kerala.description: Known for backwaters, houseboats, and coir industry.

Kerala.name: Ernakulam
Kerala.description: Contains Kochi city, commercial hub with port and IT industry.

Kerala.name: Idukki
Kerala.description: Hilly district famous for dams, spice plantations, and wildlife.

Kerala.name: Kannur
Kerala.description: Known for handloom, Theyyam festivals, and beaches.

Kerala.name: Kasaragod
Kerala.description: Northernmost district, famous for forts and coir industry.

Kerala.name: Kollam
Kerala.description: Coastal district with cashew industry and backwaters.

Kerala.name: Kottayam
Kerala.description: Known for rubber plantations and literacy.

Kerala.name: Kozhikode
Kerala.description: Historic city, famous for Malabar cuisine and beaches.

Kerala.name: Malappuram
Kerala.description: Cultural district with historic mosques and hills.

Kerala.name: Palakkad
Kerala.description: Gateway to Kerala, known for agriculture and temples.

Kerala.name: Pathanamthitta
Kerala.description: Known for Sabarimala pilgrimage and riverine beauty.

Kerala.name: Thiruvananthapuram
Kerala.description: Capital city, administrative and cultural center.

Kerala.name: Thrissur
Kerala.description: Cultural capital of Kerala, famous for festivals and temples.

Kerala.name: Wayanad
Kerala.description: Hilly district with wildlife sanctuaries and spice plantations.
